wikitext.*:
==Eligible Crew== The episode's description states: ''You may only use Common and Uncommon crew who are alien or part alien on this Cadet Challenge.'' However, the ambiguity of this statement has been a cause for confusion and discussionhttps://forums.disruptorbeam.com/stt/viewthread/51260, especially regarding the eligibility of [[Promoted Sisko]] ("The Sisko is of Bajor."http://www.chakoteya.net/DS9/550.htmhttp://memory-alpha.wikia.com/wiki/Sacrifice_of_Angels_(episode)) and crew with the [[Augment]] trait.--> Once the [[Cadet Challenge]] went live on May 3rd 2016, it became clear that [[Promoted Sisko]] can't be used. [[Lt Commander Data]] and [[Seven in Blue]], however, can be. Since version 1.2 update [[Persis]] could be used as well. This is a list of all crew confirmed to be eligible ''(partial list, to be completed)'': ;2-Star Crew Stats shown are the maximum attainable for each crew member. {| class="wikitable mw-collapsible mw-expanded sortable" style="text-align: center;" ! data-sort-type="text"| Crew Member ! data-sort-type="number"| Stars ! data-sort-type="number"| CMD ! data-sort-type="number"| DIP ! data-sort-type="number"| ENG ! data-sort-type="number"| SEC ! data-sort-type="number"| SCI ! data-sort-type="number"| MED ! data-sort-type="text"|
